LanguageData.HC_Gorgon.label: Gorgon
LanguageData.HC_Gorgon.description: A creature in the shape of a cow with a huge body, it is said that it has metal-like leather and eyes that can kill creatures by glaring at it.
LanguageData.HC_Gorgon.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.HC_Gorgon.tools.2.label: left hoof
LanguageData.HC_Gorgon.tools.3.label: right hoof
